message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit too high. I'd be willing to pay $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?
